Question
========

A simple regression shows that intelligence is not related to number of errors during assembly line work. When controlling for boredom in a multiple regression, intelligence does appear to be related to number of errors (negative relationship). What kind of variable is boredom? 
Answerlist
----------
* An interaction variable.
* A lurking variable.
* A confounder variable.
* A suppressor variable.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
